testcase.classname: Feature to try enter with the available users in the Sauce Demo web
testcase.name: Select and purchase the lowest and highest priced products
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the Sauce Demo application..............................passed And I enter the web such as standard_user user..............................passed When I select the filter Price Low to High..................................passed And I choose the products...................................................passed And I go to my cart to buy my products......................................passed Then the new purchase should be successful..................................passed
